snippet: Europe's top antitrust regulator this week told his American counterpart that allegations of search bias remain central to resolving its antitrust pursuit of Google. The European position comes amid news reports that the Federal Trade Commission may...
abstract: Europe's top antitrust regulator this week told his American counterpart that allegations of search bias remain central to resolving its antitrust pursuit of Google. The European position comes amid news reports that the Federal Trade Commission may be backing off the search-bias issue.

headline.main: For Europe, Search Bias Is Still Central in Settlement Talks With Google
